22239.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>Cheryl, stop!
Don't do anything you'll regret!<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22239.ja: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「シェリルッ！　バカなマネは　やめて！！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22239.ko: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 셰릴! 바보 같은 짓 그만해!!<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22239.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>雪莉尔！你别做傻事啊！！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22239.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>雪麗爾！妳別做傻事啊！！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22240.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>Shut up! Stay back!
Don't get close to me!<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22240.ja: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「来るな！　私に近づくなぁっ！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22240.ko: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 저리 가! 나한테 다가오지 마!<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22240.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>别过来！不要靠近我！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22240.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>別過來！不要靠近我！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22241.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>Cheryl, thank you for finally telling me the truth.
We're here to help you, please come here...<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22241.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「シェリル……。
　本当のこと　教えてくれて　ありがとう。
　助けにきたわ。さあ　こっちに来て……。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22241.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 셰릴…….
　진실을 가르쳐 줘서 고마워.
　널 구하러 왔어. 자, 이리 와…….<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22241.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>雪莉尔……
谢谢你把事情真相告诉我，
我来救你了。来吧，来我这边……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22241.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>雪麗爾……
謝謝妳把事情真相告訴我，
我來救妳了。來吧，過來我這邊……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22242.en: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>Ugh! Please stop...<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22242.ja: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「うぐぐ……！　やめてくれ　頼む……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22242.ko: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 으윽……! 그만해, 제발…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22242.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>呜唔唔……！拜托你别再说了……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22242.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>嗚唔唔……！拜託妳別再說了……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22243.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>Don't get too close to me. If I open my heart to
you the curse could come spilling out...<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22243.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「優しい言葉を　かけないでくれ……。
　心を開いてしまうと　その隙間から
　呪いが　しみだしてくるんだ……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22243.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 다정하게 말하지 마…….
　마음이 열리면 그 틈으로
　저주가 새어 나오고 말 거다…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22243.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>别对我那么温柔……
如果我敞开心扉，诅咒就会
从缝隙中渗出……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22243.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>別對我那麼溫柔……
如果我敞開心扉，詛咒就會
從縫隙中滲出來……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22244.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>The curse I took from you is growing inside
me and I can't contain it much longer.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22244.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「……お前から　受け取った呪いは
　私の中で　どんどん　大きくなって……
　もう……　私には　おさえきれない……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22244.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: ……네게서 빼앗은 저주가
　내 안에서 점점 커져서……
　이제…… 내 힘으로는 억누를 수가 없어…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22244.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>……从你那边接受的诅咒
在我体内不断变大……
已经……已经让我无法控制了……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22244.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>……從妳那邊接受的詛咒
在我體內不斷變大……
已經……已經讓我無法控制了……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22245.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>So I'm going to end myself to stop it, curse
and all.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22245.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「だから……　このまま　身を投げて
　呪いもろとも……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22245.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 그러니…… 이대로 몸을 던져
　저주와 함께…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22245.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>所以……我才想就这样跳下去，
跟着诅咒一起……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22245.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>所以……我才想就這樣跳下去，
跟著詛咒一起……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22246.en: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>No, I won't let you do it!<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22246.ja: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「そんなこと　させない！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22246.ko: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 그렇게 두지 않겠어!<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22246.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>我不会让你死的！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22246.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>我不會讓妳死的！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000767.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001><pc>! We must begin the ritual to
release Cheryl from the curse! Come on,
sprinkle the Lightdust and Moonsand!<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000767.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「<pc>ちゃん！　シェリルを
　呪いから解き放つ儀式を　始めよう！
　さあ　光の粉と　月の砂を　ふりまいて！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000767.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: <pc>! 셰릴을
　저주에서 풀어 주는 의식을 시작하자!
　자, 빛의 가루와 달의 모래를 뿌려 줘!<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000767.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001><pc>！我们开始举行仪式，
让雪莉尔从诅咒中解脱出来！
来，挥撒光之粉与月之沙吧！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000767.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001><pc>！我們開始舉行儀式，
讓雪麗爾從詛咒中解脫出來！
來，揮灑光之粉與月之砂吧！<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22250.en:
<pc> sprinkled the Lightdust and
Moonsand around Anya!
22250.ja:
<pc>は　光の粉と　月の砂を
アーニアのまわりに　ふりまいた！
22250.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 빛의 가루와 달의 모래를
아니아 주변에 뿌렸다!

洒在阿尼娅周围！
22250.zh-Hant:
<pc>將光之粉和月之砂
灑在艾妮亞周圍！

22249.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>It's now or never! Come on, spread the Lightdust

22249.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「使いどころは　今しかないわ！

22249.zh-Hans:

22249.zh-Hant:

22252.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>Anya...
Are you frigging kidding me...?<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22252.ja: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「アーニア……。お前　まさか……？<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22252.ko: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 아니아……. 너 설마……?<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22252.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>阿尼娅……你不会是要……？<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22252.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>艾妮亞……妳不會是要……？<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22253.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>Don't be a fool, Cheryl. No one can hold the
weight of the world on their shoulders alone.<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22253.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「あなたは愚かよ　シェリル……。
　全部　ひとりで　背負って生きていくなんて
　できるわけないじゃない……。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22253.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 넌 바보야, 셰릴…….
　전부 혼자서 짊어지고 살겠다니
　그런 게 가능할 리 없잖아…….<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22253.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>雪莉尔，你真愚蠢……
竟然想要独自一人背负这些活下去，
怎么可能做得到……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22253.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>雪麗爾，妳真愚蠢……
竟然想要獨自一人背負這些活下去，
怎麼可能辦得到嘛……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22254.en:
But the most foolish person is me. I can't believe that I didn't notice that my friend was suffering like
this.
22254.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「……でも　いちばん　愚かなのは　私。
　友達が　こんなふうに苦しみながら
　生きていたことに　気づかないなんて……。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22254.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 제일 바보는 나겠지.
　친구가 이렇게 고통스러워하는 것도
　알아차리지 못했다니…….<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22254.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>……不过，最愚蠢的人还是我，
我的朋友一直活得如此痛苦，
我竟然没有发现……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22254.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>……不過，最愚蠢的人還是我，
我的朋友一直活得如此痛苦，
我竟然沒有發現……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22255.en:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>I'm sorry Cheryl. I'll let you have it
back, my power.<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22255.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「ごめんね　シェリル。
　返してもらうわ　私のチカラ。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22255.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 미안해, 셰릴.
　내 힘은 이만 돌려받을게.<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22255.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>对不起，雪莉尔，
把我的力量还给我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22255.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>對不起，雪麗爾，
把我的力量還給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22256.en: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>Along with the curse.<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22256.ja: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「呪いと　一緒にね……。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22256.ko: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 저주와 함께…….<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22256.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>连同诅咒一起……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22256.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>連同詛咒一起……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22257.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>Anya, no! Don't do this...!
You don't really believe that you can
resist the curse do you!?<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22257.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「アーニア　なぜ！？
　こんなことをしたら　お前が……！
　お前は　呪いに立ち向かえると言うのか！？<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22257.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 아니아, 왜!?
　이런 짓을 하면 네가……!
　이 저주와 맞서 싸울 수 있단 거야!?<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22257.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>阿尼娅，为何要这样？！
这样做的话你会……！
你觉得自己能对抗那个诅咒吗？！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22257.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>艾妮亞，這是為什麼！？
這樣做的話妳會……！
妳覺得自己有辦法對抗那個詛咒嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22258.en: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>No... I don't know if I'll be able to. But...<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22258.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「……ううん　わかんない。
　でも……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22258.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: ……아니, 모르겠어.
　하지만……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22258.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>……我不知道。
不过……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22258.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>……我不知道。
不過……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22259.en: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>As long as I know you'll be okay...<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22259.ja: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>「ふたりなら　きっと　大丈夫…だよ……。<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22259.ko: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>: 둘이 함께라면 괜찮을… 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22259.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>两个人一起的话，一定没问题的……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22259.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01461 _normal m00001>兩個人一起的話，一定沒問題的……<stop_lip_animation n01461 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22260.ja: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「アーニア……？　アーニアッ！！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22260.ko: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 아니아……? 아니아!!<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22260.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>阿尼娅……？阿尼娅！！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22260.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>艾妮亞……？艾妮亞！！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22261.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>...They're breathing. That's good.
It looks like they just passed out...<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22261.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「……息がある。
　よかった。気を失っているだけか……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22261.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: ……숨을 쉬고 있어.
　다행이다. 정신을 잃은 것뿐인가…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22261.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>……还有呼吸，
太好了。她只是昏过去而已……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22261.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>……還有呼吸，
太好了。她只是昏過去而已啊……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22262.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>I've heard the rumors, <pc>.
They say you're the gifted young Sage who
has been helping Anya.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22262.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「……<pc>だな。ウワサは　聞いている。
　アーニアを導いた　才能ある賢者だと……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22262.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 맞지? 소문은 들었다.
　아니아를 이끌어 준 재능 있는 현자라고…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22262.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>……你就是<pc>吧，我听说过你的事。
你引导阿尼娅，是个很有才能的贤者……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22262.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>……你就是<pc>吧，我有聽過傳聞。
聽說你引導艾妮亞，是個很有才能的賢者……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22263.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>In the end, I still wasn't good enough to save
Anya. The curse has returned to her.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22263.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「結局　アーニアに　かけられた呪いは
　彼女のもとへ　戻ってしまった……。
　私が　ふがいないばっかりに……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22263.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 결국 아니아에게 걸린 저주는
　다시 아니아에게 돌아가고 말았어…….
　내가 무력한 탓에…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22263.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>结果，那个下在阿尼娅身上的诅咒
又回到她身上了……
都怪我太没用……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22263.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>結果，那個下在艾妮亞身上的詛咒
又回到她身上了……
都怪我太沒用……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22264.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>This curse... It feeds off the darkness that
lives within all of us. It will grow and poison
her heart and mind.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22264.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「この呪いはな……。
　賢者の持つ　心の闇に棲みつき
　その闇を増幅させ　心を　むしばんでいく……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22264.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 이 저주는…….
　현자가 지닌 마음의 어둠에 기생해
　그 어둠을 증폭시켜 마음을 좀먹는다…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22264.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>这个诅咒……
会附着于贤者心灵的黑暗，
让黑暗扩散，侵蚀心灵……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22264.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>這個詛咒……
會附著在賢者心靈的黑暗上，
讓黑暗擴散，侵蝕心靈……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22265.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>And when she can no longer endure the
curse, she will be overtaken by it
and the darkness will consume her.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22265.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「そして　それに　耐えられなくなったとき
　呪われた者は　悪しき賢者……
　闇賢者に　その身を堕としてしまうのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22265.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 그리고 더 이상 어둠을 버티지 못하게 되면
　저주받은 자는 사악한 현자……
　어둠의 현자로 타락하고 말지.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22265.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>然后，无法承受的被诅咒者
就会成为恶之贤者……
也就是堕落为黑暗贤者。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22265.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>然後，無法承受的被詛咒者
就會成為惡之賢者……
也就是墮落為黑暗賢者。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22266.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>If we don't do something, Anya will be lost
to us. We can't just sit by and let that happen...!<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22266.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「このまま　放っておけば　アーニアも
　呪いに心を侵され　闇賢者に堕ちてしまう。
　なんとしても　それは阻止せねば……！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22266.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 이대로 놔두면 아니아도 저주에
　마음을 잠식당해 어둠의 현자가 될 거다.
　무슨 수를 써서라도 그것만은 막아야 해……!<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22266.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>就这样不去理会的话，阿尼娅也会
被诅咒侵蚀内心，堕落成黑暗贤者。
我无论如何都必须阻止那种事发生……！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22266.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>就這樣不去理會的話，艾妮亞也會
被詛咒侵蝕內心，墮落成黑暗賢者。
我無論如何都必須阻止那種事發生……！<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22267.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>I'm taking Anya back to the institute for
the time being. <pc>, you can
meet up with us there later.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22267.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「アーニアは　私が　研究院に連れていく。
　<pc>も　あとから来てくれ。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22267.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 아니아는 내가 연구원으로 데려가마.
　<pc>도 나중에 와 다오.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22267.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>我带阿尼娅回研究院。
<pc>你也跟过来吧。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22267.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>我把艾妮亞帶去研究院。
<pc>，你晚點也過來一趟吧。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22268.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>After I get Anya back to Dolworm I'm going
to set off to find a way to end this curse
once and for all.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22268.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「アーニアを届けたのち　私は　各地をまわって
　呪いを完全に解く方法を　探すつもりだ。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22268.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 아니아를 데려다주고 나면
　난 각지를 돌며 저주를 완전히
　풀 방법을 찾을 생각이다.<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22268.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>把阿尼娅送过去以后，我会奔走各地，
寻找可以彻底解除诅咒的方法。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22268.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>把艾妮亞送過去以後，我會奔走各地，
尋找可以徹底解除詛咒的方法。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>

22269.en:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>This has gone on long enough.
It ends here with me...
Now, if you'll excuse me...<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22269.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>「今度こそ　われらの　呪われた運命に
　終止符を打たなければ……。
　それでは　失礼する……。<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22269.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>: 이번에야말로 우리의 저주받은 운명에
　종지부를 찍어야 해…….
　그럼 실례하마…….<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22269.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>这次一定要让我们这种被诅咒的命运
画上休止符……
那我先告辞了……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
22269.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01459 _normal m00001>這次一定要讓我們這種被詛咒的命運
畫上休止符……
那我先離開了……<stop_lip_animation n01459 CLOSE_MOUTH>
